Article.ArticleTitle: New Compounds and Potential Candidates for Drug Discovery from Medicinal Plants of Vietnam.

AbstractText: The study of natural products introduces interesting new bioorganic structures and potential candidates for the drug discovery stage in the development of innovative drugs. Vietnam enjoys a broad biodiversity of native plant species, microorganisms, marine organisms, and a long tradition of using herbal remedies. Thus, the study of medicinal plants in determining the basis of their efficacy and safety is an important task for modern researchers in Vietnam. The present review covers literature on new compounds elucidated from the systematic study of medicinal plants within some popular genera in Vietnam, as well as their significant biological activities.
